title: Banner Field YAML Serialization Fix
details:
Fixed issues with banner field serialization in YAML frontmatter:

1. Modified the `NoQuotesForBannerVisitor` class to better handle banner field serialization and added improved documentation.

2. Updated `MarkdownNoteBuilder.BuildNote()` method to:
   - Check for and remove quotes from banner values before serialization
   - Post-process the serialized YAML to specifically replace quoted banner values with unquoted ones
   - Add proper line breaks between XML documentation and method declaration

3. Modified `VaultIndexProcessor` to check for and remove quotes from banner values during index generation.

This ensures Obsidian wiki links in the banner field are not surrounded by quotes in the generated markdown files (e.g., `banner: [[gies-banner.png]]` instead of `banner: '[[gies-banner.png]]'` or `banner: "[[gies-banner.png]]"`). 

The fixes work with both single and double quotes, handling them at multiple levels to ensure proper output regardless of how the banner value enters the system.

Key files modified:
- NotebookAutomation.Core/Utils/NoQuotesForBannerVisitor.cs
- NotebookAutomation.Core/Utils/MarkdownNoteBuilder.cs
- NotebookAutomation.Core/Tools/Vault/VaultIndexProcessor.cs
